name: LoFi Main Line
description:
LoFi Main Line is a pixelated imagining of the East Coast Main Line ca. 1980. This is a toy. There are no points, no puzzles, no objectives, or obstacles. Just sit back, have a beverage of your choice, and watch the trains go by.

This project is inspired by a trip to England in 2018, and several nights spent relaxing in the beer garden at York station. I started this project to build my skill set, and for my own edification.

Features:

  • Randomized consists at randomized intervals.
  • Pixel art rolling stock including:
    • Class 20, 37, 45, and 47 locomotives
    • Class 101 DMU
    • Mk2 coaches
    • Assorted freight wagons.
  • Platform plying pixelated people.
  • Train spotting mode (engine numbers displayed in the lower left corner).
  • Adjustable train frequency.

Controls

  • [Alt-Enter] full screen
  • [P] toggle people
  • [-]/[=] decrease/increase train frequency
